doc.title: Crocodile Wranglers
doc.plot: Few approach them, few can face them, few understand them. Those who do are called "Crocodile Wranglers." Shot in high Definition, topics include: a researcher who puts his entire arm down the throat of a crocodile; the capture of a 750-lb. salt water crocodile; a demonstration of a "death roll"; a breeding program in Venezuela; and the unexpected revival of the American Crocodile at a nuclear power plant.
